title: What is a buddy?
content: A Buddy is just that – your friend abroad, speaking to you live in your native language, ensuring the best travel experience possible.

title: How does it work?
content: Using Buddy App connects you with a compatible travel guide – a friend in your pocket. This person is matched with you based on compatible language, location, and interests.

title: Who will I be speaking with?
content: You will be connected with a live, local person who speaks your language and shares your interests – just like a friend at home!

title: Can I only use Buddy App in Thailand?
content: Buddy App will work in any part of the world; however, as of now, our focus is on building our community in Thailand as a home base, then expanding to other locations. Feel free to set up your Buddy profile anywhere!

title: Why choose Buddy App?
content: While we recognize the value of search engines, blogs, and other existing resources, we feel that there is nothing better than a live, local human being with their plethora of knowledge and excitement to share it with our community.

title: What types of expertise are available for search when looking for a travel buddy?
content: Our application offers a variety of expertise categories, including nightlife, culture, food, adventure, and more. You can choose the expertise that aligns with your interests for a personalized travel experience.

title: How do I connect with a travel buddy after finding a match?
content: You will be connected automatically with a travel buddy that shares your language, location, and availability.

title: How much does it cost?
content: You will be able to access your Buddy for $5/hour.

title: What is the token system, and how does it work?
content: The token system allows you to pay for chat or call sessions with your chosen travel buddy. Tokens can be purchased through in-app purchases. Each expertise session is priced in tokens, providing a seamless and secure way to compensate your travel buddy for their time and knowledge.

title: Can I earn tokens by offering my expertise as a travel buddy?
content: Absolutely! If you have expertise in a particular area, you can become a travel buddy and earn tokens by assisting other users. Simply set up your profile, specify your expertise, and start helping fellow travelers.

title: How do I purchase tokens for in-app transactions?
content: To purchase tokens, navigate to the in-app purchase section. Choose the token package that suits your needs, complete the payment process, and the tokens will be credited to your account for future use.

title: Is the chat and call feature secure and private?
content: Yes, the chat and call feature is designed with privacy and security in mind. All communications are encrypted, ensuring that your conversations with travel buddies are secure and confidential.

title: Can I rate and leave feedback for my travel buddy after the session?
content: Yes, we encourage users to leave ratings and feedback for their travel buddies. This helps maintain a high rate of quality and ensures that users can make informed decisions when choosing a travel buddy.

title: How do I report inappropriate behavior or content during a session?
content: If you encounter any inappropriate behavior or content during a session, you can report it through the app. We take user safety seriously and will take appropriate actions to address any concerns promptly.
